events.name: Georgia Southern University: AppLab.Phone- Hackathon
events.about:
You will  come and develop, build and hopefully complete that next great app for the Windows Phone, using Silverlight and/or XNA.   
This is your chance to design and implement that cool new app youve been dreaming about, or put the finishing touches on your masterpiece, so bring your idea for a Mobile App  and get ready to code.   

As you are designing, writing & testing your apps onsite, there will be guidance Microsoft professionals to help you get things right.

Use your newly developed skills build apps in order to win a Windows Phone from the Microsoft Student Windows Phone promotion to be announced during the session.

Students will need to bring laptops running Windows or a Mac running dual boot Windows partition (no VM)

  • April 10th : 6:30 - 9:30pm
  • Georgia Southern University

Food & COOL Prizes will be provided
